name: Joust Mashing
description:
"Joust Mashing" is a local multiplayer game which uses both the keyboard and gamepad controller (Xbox controller recommended!) to control the jousters' movements. To play, insure both devices are connected before loading the game.

The blue jouster   uses the Xbox controller. Mash the 'A' button to move horizontally, whilst using the gamepad to move up and down.

The red jouster    uses the keyboard. Mash the 'd' key to move horizontally, whilst using the 'w' and 's' keys to move up and down.

The goal is to collide with each other    , and the player who racked up the highest speed will be the winner!  Do this by mashing the boost button and avoiding obstacles!
